title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt Snapshot

view.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt
view.subtitle: Second concurrent booking created.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Accidentally deletes availability rule, panics". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Construction Site Report with Photo Documentation. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.
